name: GUN SWITCH (Abinav Pallathoor)
description:
An action platformer with procedurally generated levels. Controlls:

[MOVEMENT]: A/D & Left Arrow/Right Arrow

[JUMPING]: W & SpaceBar & Up Arrow

[GROUND SMASH]: S & Down Arrow

[GUN SWITCH]: Shift & 1,2,3 & Scroll Wheel

[AIM]: Mouse

Game:

[Goal]: Kill all monsters in 1 minute 

Note:

If the web game doesn't work well for you try the pc build of the game bellow.
